description.value:
Wrangling Tests to influence a creature with a shock collar gain +20, however if the Wrangling Test is failed by 4 or more DoF, the creature enters a Frenzy (As with the Frenzy Talent), and tries to attack the wrangler, who must make a -30 Wrangling Test as a Full Action to bring the beast back under control.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
